title: Esmaca - Escola Macrobiotica de Catalunya
description: In the city center next to Plaza Catalunya, Esmaca offers vegetarian food cooked in its school. Menu consists of a starter, main, and dessert; choose between 3 options for each course. Also offers a detox menu. Water, tea, coffee, and bread included with your meal. The simple and natural dining area is integrated into the school where courses and alternative therapies are taught. On the 1st floor, first door.
